summary: Config YAML for controlling the right puppet arm and gripper in mobile-aloha, specifying modes and profiles for position and linear position control.

details.comment: Config YAML for controlling the right puppet arm and gripper in mobile-aloha, specifying modes and profiles for position and linear position control.
details.content:
port: /dev/ttyDXL_puppet_right
groups:
  arm:
    operating_mode: position
    profile_type: velocity
    profile_velocity: 0
    profile_acceleration: 0
    torque_enable: true
singles:
  gripper:
    operating_mode: linear_position
    profile_type: velocity
    profile_velocity: 0
    profile_acceleration: 0
    torque_enable: true
